name: Immunity from liability
text:
Anyone participating in good faith in the disclosure or nondisclosure of a government record shall be immune from any liability, civil or criminal, that might otherwise be incurred, imposed or result from such acts or omissions. [L 1988, c 262, pt of §1]
 
Case Notes
 
  Cited:  134 H. 181, 339 P.3d 679 (2014).
